players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the villager.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: remained silent.
You: "Since Alice was killed, the mafia must be among us. Charlie has been silent; that raises suspicion. Let's vote to eliminate Charlie."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and discovered they're mafia."
You: "Charlie, your silence is suspicious. Diana says you're mafia. As a villager, I support voting you out."
Charlie: "Bob, I don't see proof Charlie killed Alice. Diana might be wrong. Vote for Diana."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and found them mafia. Bob, as a villager you can't be mafia. Charlie, no proof that you killed Alice. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
memory: You're Charlie, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
The villager Alice was found dead.
Beware, Diana is the detective and discovered you're the mafioso.
Day 1 begins.
You: remained silent.
Bob: "Since Alice was killed, the mafia must be among us. Charlie has been silent; that raises suspicion. Let's vote to eliminate Charlie."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and discovered they're mafia."
Bob: "Charlie, your silence is suspicious. Diana says you're mafia. As a villager, I support voting you out."
You: "Bob, I don't see proof Charlie killed Alice. Diana might be wrong. Vote for Diana."
Diana: "I investigated Charlie last night and found them mafia. Bob, as a villager you can't be mafia. Charlie, no proof that you killed Alice. Vote Charlie."

players.name: Diana
memory: You're Diana, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Alice was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: remained silent.
Bob: "Since Alice was killed, the mafia must be among us. Charlie has been silent; that raises suspicion. Let's vote to eliminate Charlie."
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and discovered they're mafia."
Bob: "Charlie, your silence is suspicious. Diana says you're mafia. As a villager, I support voting you out."
Charlie: "Bob, I don't see proof Charlie killed Alice. Diana might be wrong. Vote for Diana."
You: "I investigated Charlie last night and found them mafia. Bob, as a villager you can't be mafia. Charlie, no proof that you killed Alice. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Diana, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
